Notes: A small blue star that can pull the player towards it if they touch it with their pointer. If the player is too far away from this object, it will become inactive and the player cannot point at it. It usually remains stationary but can move on a path as well. The player can be ejected while using the Pull Star if he gets to close to it, although this is an optional setting.

Obj_arg0.Name: Release Distance
Obj_arg0.Description: The radius in which the player will be released automatically. Default is -1 which deactivates this behavior.

Obj_arg1.Name: Pointable Range
Obj_arg1.Description: The valid range in which the player can use this object. Default is 2500.

Obj_arg2.Name: Inactive Color Type
Obj_arg2.Description: Specifies the color to be used when the player is too far away from this object.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: The object will disappear once this switch gets activated.

SW_PARAM.Description: The path movement speed is adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement hwhen this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.

Group.Description: Used to synchronize the execution of several other grouped Pull Stars when the object's appearance cutscene is active.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. Furthermore, the object will not appear initially.
